How to fix 'Could not find public_suffix-4.0.3 in any of the sources - Jekyll'

By on June 24, 2020

I was trying to build the Jekyll blog with command “bundle exec jekyll serve”. But I received the errror “Could not find public_suffix-4.0.3 in any of the sources”. I fixed by by running the command below … “bundle install”.

That will install all missing packages.
